channel.title: Compiler.bat / run.bat help
channel.description:
[b]this comes up when i try too compile :[/b] [URL=http://www.picturepush.com/public/1397010][IMG]http://www2.picturepush.com/photo/a/1397010/img/1397010.png[/img][/URL] [b] in edit this is what my compliler says : [/b]
@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
[b]this comes up when i try too run :[/b] [URL=http://www.picturepush.com/public/1397042][IMG]http://www4.picturepush.com/photo/a/1397042/img/1397042.png[/img][/URL] [b]on edit this is whats in my run.bat :[/b]
title OldSchoolScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
I'd be very gratefull if someone could post, im new too this, any help will do. thanks.

item.title: Compiler.bat / run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

ok thanks for replying, im new too this ive done absolutely no edititng too my delta scape source which i have dled from this forum in another thread, do you think its just that source, and i should try another? or is they some way i can fix this.

thanks.

edit: also the text when i click edit run.bat and edit compile.bat, the text which is quoted above, is that correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler.bat / run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It can’t find the ‘server’ class, meaning it can’t find the server.java. Looks as if your server is missing files, or you have the directories inside the batches messed up.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler.bat / run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

that meaning theres a problem with my enviromental variables? any ideas whats up with run.bat?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler.bat / run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The compiler can’t find any Java files to compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler.bat / run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:

this comes up when i try too compile :



in edit this is what my compliler says :

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

this comes up when i try too run :

on edit this is whats in my run.bat :

title OldSchoolScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

I’d be very gratefull if someone could post, im new too this, any help will do.

thanks.

Read full topic
